title: The logic of feminism
author: VD
content_html:
As I have previously written, there is no ideology so self-defeating as the feminist ideology which underlies so-called “women’s rights”. Sweden is now putting into practice what I have long expected would be the logically dictated consequence of a right to abortion:

Sweden, which legalized abortion in 1938, has taken its abortion extremism one step further by legalizing “gender based” abortion which allows a mother to decide to abort her baby solely due to his or her sex.

Don’t be surprised when most of the lives being terminated by their mothers on the sole basis of their sex turn out to be female. Only the truly short-sighted could attempt to rationally defend women’s rights, which in addition to systematically lowering the wage rate and making it harder for women to bear and raise children, now expressly include the right to murder a child for the crime of being female.

The West can no longer pretend that its populace has not faced a choice between its secular values and its demographic survival over the last two generations. Its people have had the option of choosing societal survival or the slow and ongoing suicide of women’s rights and equalitarianism. To date, the evidence suggests that the greater part of the populace has opted for the latter. So, don’t be surprised when in the interest of the survival of Western society, the ability to choose between the two is taken away from at least a portion of the population. Indeed, significant progress towards a political structure capable of removing this option from the citizenry has already been made courtesy of the European Union.
